snippet.title: Hyper Flux | Gameplay Trailer | Demo Out Now | Steam Next Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Hyper Flux is a single-player speedrunning 3D platformer that demands you to speed through shattered planets using your zero-gravity suit and force-manipulating orbs. Fly through the skies of insane levels to reach the end portal as fast as possible.

Play the Demo
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3260780/Hyper_Flux_Demo/

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2813890/Hyper_Flux/

Press Kit
https://impress.games/press-kit/furegus/hyper-flux


#Gaming #Games #indiegame #indiegames2024 #steamnextfest #hyperflux 

Music Credits
